text: Angelo "AnÄ¡lu" Farrugia (born 29 December 1955) is a Maltese politician. He is the Speaker of the House of Representatives of Malta. He was the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, timesofmalta.com, 20 Dec 2012, retrieved on 21 December 2012 a Member of Parliament. ==References== Category:Speakers of the House of Representatives of Malta Category:1955 births Category:Living people
title: Angelo Farrugia
